 p.add_argument("-n", type=int, default=1000, help="grid size")
 args = p.parse_args()
 field = np.cos(np.linspace(0, 2*np.pi, args.n))  # stand-in for a model field
-stats = {"N": args.n, "min": float(field.min()), "max": float(field.max()), "mean": float(field.mean())}
